attributes.action: The Legalization of Cannabis for medicinal purposes only.
attributes.additional_details: If Cannabis were to get legalized it should only be put on a strict prescription and given to those who need it the most. I have NF1 a genetic disorder which is effecting my everyday life. I am depressed, anxious and get in horrible pain, I also have a brain tumour which is inoperable and unable to have a biopsy. The use of cannabis has brought my depression, anxiety down and my pains are almost nonexistent. Even if it has to go on a temporary trial, you will see how much it changes us.
attributes.background:
Cannabis is becoming legalized across the globe and we are saying it's harmful to our health. From the years 1993 to 2012 how many people have died from Cannabis related deaths to Alcohol related deaths? 

One of them is approximately 20.
